dialogues.text: You are trespassing sacred grounds. What business have you here? Speak up.

options.text: I'm looking for the origin of the Aemir river.

dialogues.text: Gah. And why would I tell you? So you can pollute the river even more?

options.text: I want to help and understand why the river was polluted.

dialogues.text: Do you now? If you are serious about this, speak to me at the river's origin.
I warn you, human. Do not trick me or I will personally turn you into a mushroom.
